2F2C30.title: official start homepage built
2F2C30.text: Today started the built of my personal art based homepage. Despite being the first version or also called lite-version, I'm looking forward to the results! On the occasion of the developing, I created this acryl painting in memory of these beautiful sunrises I experienced last holiday.

7B5328.title: new artwork - Tutanchamun
7B5328.text: Creating detailed faces was always a challenge for me, but it feels a bit easier when I can do masks. Especially the gold/red theme kept me fascinating which was the reason I finally did my first egyptian drawing.

DBDDD7.title: faceless african beauty
DBDDD7.text: A few weeks ago I saw this white dress in the window display and immediately wanted to draw it, but I couldn't come up with a good context. Looking for some inspiration, I found myself on pinterest and I felt overwhelmed ever since. Let me tell you, pinterest is now one of my most frequent used apps and I came up with this painting.

59B6CE.title: Gemini birds, happy birthday
59B6CE.text: For my mothers birthday last year, she wished for this tropical birds painting. I was sitting on this for many hours, but the result was very joyful.

A-0001.title: Shopping Tour Boesner
A-0001.text: I had a playful shopping tour with my son at Boesner in Vienna today. Needed just a few things but it took us over an hour to finish because of all the jokes and discovering of new products. One of them is my new white art coat - let's see how long it takes for the first color stains ;)

A-0002.title: Domain purchased!
A-0002.text: With this day my domain was officially purchased and activated :) For now, only a placeholder will be displayed, but when the first version (v1.0.0) will be finished, my webpage will be accessable by https://artcreation-dv.at!!
